tool_description: Analyzes scientific literature to extract disease mechanisms, associated pathways, and potential therapeutic targets from peer-reviewed publications and databases.

disease_name.description: Primary disease or condition name for literature analysis

literature_databases.description: List of literature databases to search (PubMed, PMC, Embase, etc.)

publication_years.description: Year range for literature search as [start_year, end_year]

max_publications.description: Maximum number of publications to analyze

error_messages: Disease name not found: The provided disease name returned no literature results. Try synonyms or related terms.
Invalid database selection: Use supported databases like PubMed, PMC, Embase, Cochrane.
Invalid year range: Publication years must be between 1990-2024 with start_year <= end_year.
Insufficient literature: Less than 10 relevant publications found. Consider broadening search terms.
API access error: Unable to connect to literature databases. Check network connectivity.
usage: Provide disease_name and literature_databases array. Optionally specify publication_years range and max_publications limit. Tool extracts disease mechanisms and pathways from relevant literature.

disease_mechanisms.description: List of identified disease mechanisms and pathophysiology

associated_pathways.description: Biological pathways associated with the disease
